comment.brief: The request is for a normal transition (animated) to the target page
comment.full: The request is for a normal transition (animated) to the target page

comment.brief: The request is to immediately change to target page bypassing any animations
comment.full: The request is to immediately change to target page bypassing any animations

comment.brief:
This page is being prepared for an interactive transition, such as the user sliding the page into view.
The indicated page becomes the target of partial progress. If this is not supported then nothing happens and partial progress does not work.
comment.full:
This page is being prepared for an interactive transition, such as the user sliding the page into view.
The indicated page becomes the target of partial progress. If this is not supported then nothing happens and partial progress does not work.

comment.brief: How to transition to the new page.
comment.full: How to transition to the new page.
